titleStmt.title: Description of Free Library of Philadelphia, Lewis P 263: Painting of a Mosque Scene

notesStmt.note: Early 20th century imitation of an illustration from a circa 1525-1527 Divan of Hafiz (see: Marianna Shreve Simpson, "Mostly Modern Miniatures" in Muqarnas V.25 2008).

msIdentifier.collection: John Frederick Lewis collection of Oriental Manuscripts
